body_html:
As far as I know, for different precision-level dtypes, there are some tricks taking into consideration.
For example, for fp16, the loss may needs to be adjusted to compensate for the potential accuracy degradation.
So I think a straight-forward template-based data type enhancement may not be enough.

body:
As far as I know, for different precision-level dtypes, there are some tricks taking into consideration.
For example, for fp16, the loss may needs to be adjusted to compensate for the potential accuracy degradation.  
So I think a straight-forward template-based data type enhancement may not be enough.
